Title: Relates to the New York election officer protection act
Summary: Prohibits the intimidation, obstruction, or doxing of election officers; makes election officers eligible for the address confidentiality program.
LawCode: Add ยง3-422, El L; add ยง195.25, Pen L; amd ยง108, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, the penal law and the executive law, in relation to the New York election officer protection act
